text: allāh tama dayāven ovunṭa pahaḷa kaḷa dæya magin satuṭaṭa pat vūvan bavaṭa siṭinnāha. (tavada yuddhayehi maraṇayaṭa pat vī) taman samaga ekatu novī tamangen pasu (melova paṇa piṭin) siṭinnan gænada “ovunṭa kisima biyak æti vannē næta. ovun duk vannēda næta” yayi itāmat satuṭaṭa pat vūvan vaśayenda siṭinnāha
